text: Tsuini waga meirei wa kudatte, daichi no sho mizu ga seki o kitte hotobashiri deta toki, ware wa itta. `Subete no ikimono no hitotsu ga ito, shinko-sha-tachi to, anata no kazoku de senkoku ga sudeni kudasa reta mono igai o sono naka ni nose nasai.'Daga kare to tomoni shinko shita mono wa sukunakatta
